signature.embedding_text: A reduction of X percent in price enables a purchaser to obtain X kg more for ₹X.

trick.name: Price-Quantity Swap Trick
trick.one_liner: Jab price X% ghat jaaye, toh X kg zyada milta hai ₹X mein.

steps.action: Assume original price per kg as ₹x.
Use equation to find x using additional quantity and expenditure.
steps.action_hi: अतिरिक्त मात्रा और खर्च से x निकालो।

trick.memory_hook: Price ghatne se zyada milta hai, yaad rakho!

common_mistakes.mistake: Ignoring the reduction percentage in calculations.
common_mistakes.wrong: Using original price directly without reduction.
common_mistakes.why: Students forget to adjust price for reduction.

deep.explanation: Jab kisi vastu ka price ghat jaata hai, toh uski khapat kaise badhti hai, yeh samjhaana zaroori hai. Pehle original price assume karo, phir reduction percentage se naya price nikalo. Phir additional quantity aur total expenditure se equation banao aur solve karo. Isse concept clear hoga aur galtiyan kam hongi.

shortcut.explanation: Price reduction aur additional quantity ko use karke jaldi se equation banao aur solve karo.

instant.explanation: Price X% ghatne par X kg zyada milta hai ₹X mein.
